name: AKMAL
description:
AKMAL is a turn-based strategy game. Conquer planets defeating your opponents.
Show courage, confidence and creativity in your thinking.

Planets:
- 4 types of planets (Green, Snow, Crater and Desert)

Maps:
- Map size from 128x128 to 1024x1024
- Map editor (create your own maps)

Units:
- 61 unique types of units
- Unit editor (change the characteristics of existing types of units: armor, damage, amount of ammunition, scan and attack radius, etc.)

Computer opponents:
- fight simultaneously with 1, 2 or 3 computer opponents
